div.p: USM is active in various research fields, including multimedia conferencing and satellite communications. Research in satellite communications focuses on: IPv6 over satellite, Video Conferencing over satellite, QoS issue IPv4 and IPv6 traffic for satellite links, Distance Education, and IP over DVB-S.
Malaysia Technology Expo 2006 - Unidirectional Link Mesh Network over DVB-S (Bronze Medal)
Multicasting IPv6 and Reliable Multimedia Conferencing over Satellite, IRPA Long Term Grant, Jan 2000 - July 2003.
Investigation of Satellite-Based Unidirectional Link for Wide Area Collaboration, IRPA EA Grant, Sept 2002 - Dec 2004.
AI3 and SOI Asia Meeting at KUSTEM, Kuala Terengganu, 2005
